scripts.install-deps: concurrently "cd frontend && npm install" "cd backend && npm install" "cd contracts && npm install"
scripts.deploy-contracts: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network localhost
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start-node" "sleep 5 && npm run deploy-contracts" "sleep 10 && npm run start-backend" "sleep 15 && npm run start-frontend"
